subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: QS news update
msgSnippet: ... Yes, that is the point. Which is why I think many words should represent how we see them to make reading and use easier. For example, we all see The as a
messageBody:
Anthony Grahn wrote:

>
> The "good point" is this: having used a publication that very
> accurately reflects the real sound speakers make (not their mere
> mental image) we got wrong-ish results.
>

Yes, that is the point. Which is why I think many words should represent
how we see them to make reading and use easier. For example, we all see
"The" as a single letter the single letter Thither, so it would be good
to extend such use where possible.

Paul
